author: Ian Phllips
reviewBody: Arrival is a bit strange taxi wise because if you are single they want to find more people. Thought I was going to have to wait. Departure - American Airlines should add another kiosk as the kiosk was very slow. No TSA pre-check but they will give you an expedite notice. I have 2 artificial legs so always a trial for me. However must point out the security was definitely above average. Comfortable waiting area and restaurant. I did not eat there. This is a walk on tarmac airport.
